author: Al Porc
content: Keep allowing American industry and our colleges to bring in foreign nationals. American industry need all these “experience people” because there is no qualified citizens to do the job. On top of that a lot of our computers are assembled overseas. Who knows what “trojan Horses” are being installed in those chips. On an aside why are all those computers allowed to be connected to the web in the first place. These machines should be totally isolated from the web.

author: Peter Wright
content:
“This is not the first time that Chinese hackers have made off with secret information and plans. In the past they have stolen designs for the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter; the advanced Patriot PAC-3 missile system; the Army anti-ballistic missile system known as Terminal High Altitude Area Defense; and the Navyâ€™s Littoral Combat Ships.”

Once is unlucky, twice is careless, three times is enemy action………..
